content.raw:
The joint syntax changed in 1.4. The <joint><child> and <joint><parent> tags were moved to <joint><child><link_name> and <joint><parent><link_name> [(see link to sdf documentation here)](http://gazebosim.org/sdf/dev.html#link_name296).

I just looked at double_pendulum_with_base, and it doesn't look changed. We'll have to do gzsdf convert or manually update all the models with joints.
content.html:
The joint syntax changed in 1.4. The <joint><child> and <joint><parent> tags were moved to <joint><child><link_name> and <joint><parent><link_name> (see link to sdf documentation here).

I just looked at double_pendulum_with_base, and it doesn't look changed. We'll have to do gzsdf convert or manually update all the models with joints.
